testcase.classname: Feature to test the functionality of the browser
testcase.name: I want to verify the URL
Checking the functionality for valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user on the webpage "https://www.saucedemo.com/"......................passed And user gives username as 'standard_user'..................................passed And user gives password as 'secret_sauce'...................................passed When click on the LoginButton...............................................passed Then user navigates to product backlog page.................................passed

testcase.name: Checking the functionality for valid data 2
testcase.system-out: Given user on the webpage "https://www.saucedemo.com/"......................passed And user gives username as 'problem_user'...................................passed And user gives password as 'secret_sauce'...................................passed When click on the LoginButton...............................................passed Then user navigates to product backlog page.................................passed
